title: Sampler, 1723
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: spaced running (pattern darning), four-sided and cross stitches on plain weave foundation. Darning interlaces in one direction only.
dimensions: H x W x D: 32 x 33 cm (12 5/8 x 13 in.)
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Eighteen examples of pattern darning in a grid arrangement signed "Marie Terese Fourbisseur.  Anno 1723."

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1723.
1723. Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: spaced running (pattern darning), four-sided and cross stitches on plain weave foundation. Darning interlaces in one direction only.. Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection. 1976-100-20.
